channel.title: Banned?
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Banned? D:[/size] We'll recently today I tryed to logg on Moparscape (the other Moparscape Website, and it wouldn't let me loggin or do anything.. It was saying.. "sorry iDontRun, You are banned from releasing malitious malware.." blah blah.. iDontRun is my brother's account and now I can't use the forums because he screwed up? Meh.. thats just wrong that you get Ip-Banned, as it won't let me change accounts.. it'll just say sorry.. your banned.. :/
The reason i'm posting this here is because there's no other section of the forums to post this on.. So if a mod reads this or somthing it would be nice if you could help me out.. For now i'll just have to use RL for Tuts and stuff I suppose.. :/[/center]

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I’ve banned him. He can use one of the rival sites he suggested.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Unhandled:

Fuck off and shut up you retarded faggot.

This,

Seperate note… you have no idea how many people say “it was my brother” It is the Worst excuse anyone can ever use. yet people who are fucking dumb… Still use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @thebigpurpleglob thebigpurpleglob
item.description:
@thebigpurpleglob wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Banned? D:[/size]
We’ll recently today I tryed to logg on Moparscape (the other Moparscape Website, and it wouldn’t let me loggin or do anything…
It was saying… “sorry iDontRun, You are banned from releasing malitious malware…” blah blah… iDontRun is my brother’s account and now I can’t use the forums because he screwed up? Meh… thats just wrong that you get Ip-Banned, as it won’t let me change accounts… it’ll just say sorry… your banned…

The reason i’m posting this here is because there’s no other section of the forums to post this on…
So if a mod reads this or somthing it would be nice if you could help me out… For now i’ll just have to use RL for Tuts and stuff I suppose… :/[/center]

Read full topic
